<!-- The research question: is whether one favors capital punishment or not independent of race? -->

$H_0$: race and opinion on capital punishment are independent.  
$H_A$: opinion on capital opinion is related to race


<!--  Download the data from NORC -->
at https://gss.norc.org/get-the-data/spss download the zip file 2018.spss.zip

<!-- Upload the zip file; it comes in as a .sav file -->


```{r}
library(foreign)
# put data set name in the read
GPSS <- read.spss("dataset.sav", use.value.label=TRUE, to.data.frame=TRUE)
```


```{r}
GPSS$RACE
GPSS$CAPPUN
```
